com.saic.uicds.core.em.util

Class MapRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saic.uicds.core.em.util.MapRenderer

  • public class MapRenderer
extends Object
    MapRenderer renders WMS Web Map Context documents, also known as View Context documents, by requesting individual layers as images from their respective services and compositing those images into one final image
    Author:
    Patrick Neal - Image Matters, LLC

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapRenderer()

        public MapRenderer()

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public Image render(Element viewContext,
           String[] layers,
           com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Envelope bbox,
           int width,
           int height,
           String format)
             throws Exception
        This method renders the layers from the viewContext into an image of the specified width and height contrained by the bbox.
        Parameters:
        viewContext - Node root node in ViewContext document
        bbox - Envelope spatial extent of map
        width - int x-dimension of map image
        height - int y-dimension of map image
        format - String mimetype of resulting map image and propogated to the map services providing each component layer.
        Returns:
        Image composited map image
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getMapRequest

        protected String getMapRequest(String href,
                   String name,
                   com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Envelope bbox,
                   int width,
                   int height,
                   String format)
        Composes a GetMap request url for a single layer.
        Parameters:
        href - String url to the layer's WMS
        name - String id of the layer
        bbox - Envelope spatial extent of the map image
        width - x-dimension of the map image
        height - y-dimension of the map image
        format - String mime-type of the map image
        Returns:
        String url for a GetMap request to the layer's WMS

      • createImage

        public static BufferedImage createImage(String format,
                        int width,
                        int height,
                        boolean transparent)
        Create a BufferedImage with the specified dimensions. If the format is "gif" then the image will be cleared with the background color (black).
        Parameters:
        format - String
        width - int
        height - int
        transparent - boolean
        Returns:
        BufferedImage

      • toBufferedImage

        public static BufferedImage toBufferedImage(Image image)
        This method returns a buffered image with the contents of an image. Borrowed and modified from the Java Developer's Almanac: http://www.exampledepot.com/egs/java.awt.image/Image2Buf.html
        Parameters:
        image -
        Returns:
        bufferedImage

      • hasAlpha

        public static boolean hasAlpha(Image image)
        This method returns true if the specified image has transparent pixels Borrowed from the Java Developer's Almanac: http://www.exampledepot.com/egs/java.awt.image/HasAlpha.html
        Parameters:
        image -
        Returns:
        boolean
